meanings.definition: Unscrupulousnesses: the quality or characteristic of being unscrupulous
meanings.sent1: Her unscrupulousnesses were evident in the way she cheated on the test without any guilt.
meanings.sent2: The unscrupulousnesses of the con artist were finally exposed by the authorities.
meanings.sent3: Despite his unscrupulousnesses, he always managed to charm his way out of trouble.
meanings.sent4: The unscrupulousnesses of the greedy businessman knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The unscrupulousnesses of the villain made him a formidable foe.

meanings.definition: Unscrupulousnesses: actions or behavior that lack moral principles or integrity
meanings.sent1: The unscrupulousnesses of the thief were evident in his sneaky ways.
meanings.sent2: She was shocked by the unscrupulousnesses of her colleague's betrayal.
meanings.sent3: The unscrupulousnesses of the cat stealing food from the dog's bowl was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The unscrupulousnesses of the storm wreaked havoc on the small town.
meanings.sent5: His unscrupulousnesses in business dealings eventually led to his downfall.
